name: Incredible Gochujang Sauce
description: This delightful, creamy, silky, incredible gochujang sauce is what I put on everything! Made in five minutes and delicious as ever!
ingredients: 1–2 tablespoons gochujang sauce (I use a sauce like this)
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a small bowl. Taste and adjust! I usually add a small pinch of salt because I love salt. You can also thin it out with a tablespoon of water so more of a drizzle if that’s what you’re going for! Serve as a dip with grilled or air-fried chicken, a dressing for a creamy slaw, a spread on a burger – whatever floats your boat. It’s all so delicious.
